intro.title: 10 Years From Now
intro.subtitle: Future Self Discovery Test
intro.description: Based on your current habits, personality, and goals,
intro.description_2: We predict who you will become in 10 years!

q1.text: When a new project comes up, what's your first reaction?
q1.b: I approach it creatively and generate new ideas
q1.d: I start and adjust as needed

q3.text: How do you typically spend your weekends?
q3.a: Creating or sharing popular content on social media
q3.b: Immersed in artistic or creative activities
q3.d: Exploring new places or seeking adventures

q4.c: Venture out and find new solutions alone

q5.a: Working without time or location constraints
q5.b: Making an impact through creative work
q5.c: Playing a key role in an organization

q6.a: Reset goals and work even harder
q6.c: Take personal time to compose myself
q6.d: Research and analyze to solve the problem

q7.a: When I created new technology or ideas
q7.b: When I comforted and helped someone
q7.c: When many people liked my content
q7.d: When I made a successful important decision

q8.text: How do people generally perceive you?
q8.b: Smart and good at understanding theory

q9.a: I empathize emotionally and provide comfort
q9.b: I offer creative solutions from new perspectives
q9.c: I analyze systematically and give advice
q9.d: I work directly to solve the problem together

q10.text: How do you overcome your weaknesses?
q10.c: By taking on new challenges to overcome fear
q10.d: By connecting with many people and learning from them

q11.b: A place where creativity and freedom are respected
q11.d: An environment enabling growth and innovation

q12.text: What you most want to be in 10 years?
q12.a: An independent person with time freedom
q12.d: A brave person pursuing your dreams

result.title: Your Future Self Is
result.recommended: You might also enjoy these apps
result.shareMessage: 10 years from now, I will be

descriptions.ceo: You will lead the future with strategic thinking and leadership. With your goal-oriented and decisive nature, you'll successfully guide organizations and projects.
descriptions.artist: You will make the world more beautiful with creativity and expression. Your art will touch many hearts as you express your feelings and ideas.
descriptions.adventurer: You will blaze new trails with courage and pioneering spirit. You'll create your own story through new experiences and challenges beyond everyday constraints.
descriptions.scholar: You will pursue truth with curiosity and analytical skills. Through deep academic pursuits and research, you'll contribute valuable knowledge to society.
descriptions.healer: You will heal others with your warm heart and empathy. You'll comfort and support those around you, touching hearts with your warmth.
descriptions.influencer: You will inspire many with your charisma and influence. By expressing your uniqueness, you'll grow alongside your followers.
descriptions.inventor: You will create the future with innovative thinking. You'll transform the world through new technologies and ideas.
descriptions.freelancer: You will chart your own path with a free spirit. You'll experience true freedom living your own way without time or space constraints.

characteristics.ceo: Achievement-oriented, Decisive, Strategic thinker, Responsible, Results-focused
characteristics.artist: Creative, Emotionally expressive, Original, Meticulous, Inspired easily
characteristics.adventurer: Challenging spirit, Courageous, Pioneering, Active, Seeks new experiences
characteristics.scholar: Analytical, Thoughtful, Curious, Logical, Deep thinking
characteristics.influencer: Charismatic, Communicative, Strong personality, Positive, Influential

advice.ceo: Now: Develop your team-building and communication skills further. A leader who listens to others' opinions will become even greater.
advice.artist: Now: Build business acumen alongside technical skill. This will help share your art with more people.
advice.adventurer: Now: Challenges are good, but planning matters too. A thoughtful adventurer achieves greater success.
advice.scholar: Now: Experience practice, not just theory. It's important to develop practical skills to share your knowledge with the world.
advice.healer: Now: Take care of yourself first. Protecting your energy is the foundation for helping others better.
advice.influencer: Now: Add depth and authenticity. Genuine messages linger in hearts longer than flashiness alone.
advice.inventor: Now: Don't stay in your own ideas; collaborate. Diverse perspectives create greater innovation.
advice.freelancer: Now: Create structure within freedom. Self-management and goal-setting make freedom more meaningful.

wisdom.ceo: Success is the result of endless execution and decisive action toward goals. - Steve Jobs
wisdom.artist: Every artist begins as an amateur. Your art is your most authentic voice. - Maya Angelou
wisdom.adventurer: Life's greatest adventure is living the life you choose. - Oprah Winfrey
wisdom.scholar: Knowledge is power. But wisdom is knowing how to use that power. - Francis Bacon
wisdom.healer: To heal others, you must first understand your own wounds. Your experience is your greatest asset. - Carl Jung
wisdom.influencer: True influence isn't leading people somewhere, it's helping them become themselves. - Simon Sinek
wisdom.inventor: The future is created by us. Do you have the courage to change the world? - Nikola Tesla
wisdom.freelancer: Freedom means responsibility. Your choices define your life. - Paulo Coelho
